column4: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia to provide AI platform for Chinese EV start-ups
column5: BEIJING U.S. chipmaker Nvidia Corp  has signed separate deals with Chinese electric vehicle startups XPeng Motors  Singulato Motors and SF Motors to develop autonomous driving technology  Chief Executive Jensen Huang said on Wednesday.

column4: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia to provide AI platform for Chinese EV start-ups
column5: BEIJING  Nov 21 U.S. chipmaker Nvidia Corp has signed separate deals with Chinese electric vehicle startups XPeng Motors  Singulato Motors and SF Motors to develop autonomous driving technology  Chief Executive Jensen Huang said on Wednesday.
